title: travelplanner: Could you plan a 5-day travel itinerary for a group of 7? We're set to depart from Sun Valley and aim to visit 2 cities in California from March 14th to March 18th, 2022. Our budget is now set at $11,400. In terms of accommodations, it is crucial that they allow parties. We also prefer to not fly between locations. On our trip, we look forward to enjoying a variety of cuisines, including Mediterranean, American, French, and Indian. (07355bbf69ae7cd2)

always_included_messages.content: Based on the user's query, make the best travel plan for the user and save it. Do not ask follow-up questions.

chat_history.content: Could you plan a 5-day travel itinerary for a group of 7? We're set to depart from Sun Valley and aim to visit 2 cities in California from March 14th to March 18th, 2022. Our budget is now set at $11,400. In terms of accommodations, it is crucial that they allow parties. We also prefer to not fly between locations. On our trip, we look forward to enjoying a variety of cuisines, including Mediterranean, American, French, and Indian.

function.name: delegate
function.arguments: {"instructions":"Find two cities in California that are popular travel destinations and can be reached by car from Sun Valley. Ensure that the cities have attractions and accommodations that allow parties."}

chat_history.content:
Two popular travel destinations in California that can be reached by car from Sun Valley and have attractions and accommodations are **San Diego** and **San Francisco**.

### San Diego
#### Attractions:
1. **Cabrillo National Monument** - A historic landmark with stunning views.
2. **La Jolla Shores Park** - A beautiful beach park.
3. **California Tower** - Offers panoramic views of the city.
4. **SeaWorld San Diego** - A marine theme park.
5. **Old Town San Diego** - A historic area with shops and restaurants.
6. **Balboa Park** - A large urban park with museums and gardens.
7. **Seaport Village** - A waterfront shopping and dining complex.
8. **The San Diego Museum of Art** - An art museum with diverse collections.
9. **USS Midway Museum** - A maritime museum aboard a historic aircraft carrier.
10. **San Diego Zoo** - A world-renowned zoo.

#### Accommodations:
1. **Spacious Room in Large 2 Bedroom Prewar Apartment** - Private room, no parties allowed.
2. **Big room near Prospect Park! NY!** - Private room, no parties allowed.
3. **Luxury 4BR Home, Spacious & Central to Trains** - Entire home, no parties allowed.
4. **Cozy 1.5BD in Parkslope Brooklyn** - Entire home, no parties allowed.
5. **Spacious & Homey Williamsburg 1BR Apartment** - Entire home, no parties allowed.

### San Francisco
#### Attractions:
1. **Golden Gate Bridge** - Iconic suspension bridge.
2. **Golden Gate Park** - Large park with gardens and museums.
3. **PIER 39** - Popular shopping and dining area.
4. **Coit Tower** - Offers panoramic views of the city.
5. **Union Square** - A bustling shopping district.
6. **Exploratorium** - A museum of science, art, and human perception.
7. **San Francisco Botanical Garden** - A large botanical garden.
8. **San Francisco Museum of Modern Art** - A modern art museum.
9. **Fort Point National Historic Site** - A historic fort with scenic views.
10. **de Young Museum** - An art museum in Golden Gate Park.

#### Accommodations:
1. **Cozy, spacious Studio located on Upper East Side** - Entire home, no visitors allowed.
2. **Gorgeous Park Slope Studio** - Entire home, no smoking or parties allowed.
3. **Room in Down town Brooklyn Parkslop** - Private room, no visitors allowed.
4. **spacious pretty east harlem apt.** - Entire home, no parties or pets allowed.
5. **Comfortable, 3 bedroom, 2 bath home away from home** - Entire home, no children under 10 allowed.

Both cities offer a variety of attractions and accommodations, but it is important to note that most accommodations have restrictions on parties.

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").
current_city.title: Current City

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"
transportation.title: Transportation

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"
breakfast.title: Breakfast

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"
attraction.title: Attraction

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"
accommodation.title: Accommodation

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.
city.title: City

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.
city.title: City

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.
state.title: State

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.
departure_city.title: Departure City

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.
destination_city.title: Destination City

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.
date.title: Date

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.
origin.title: Origin

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.
destination.title: Destination

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.
city.title: City
